title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium] - 4／28 (Mon) 4：00 pm, 최진석 교수님 (서강대)
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium] - 4／28 (Mon) 4：00 pm, 최진석 교수님 (서강대) date:0000-00-00T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=11432&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Speaker: 최진석 교수님 Title: 인문학은 어떻게 실용성을 발휘하는가?
